content: HDI SS303 Drop-in anchor High-performance manual-set drop in anchor (303 stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stainless steel provides corrosion resistance for exterior environments Anchor, setting tool and Hilti drill bit form a matched tolerance system to provide more reliable fastenings Optional below surface setting for easy patchwork Allows for shallow embedment without sacrificing performance Applications Anchoring in exterior applications requiring a flush finish ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Dry indoor, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, A2 Base materials: Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A2 | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 336430 -
